items.text: good length and outside off, Rohit blocks to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: strays in line and Rohit clips it smartly away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: pulls a short ball coming up towards his throat away to long leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: there's another! A pull shot from the top draw - this one off the front foot! An early read of the length, a full swing of the arms, and the ball simply soars. Rohit in top form
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, FOUR runs

items.text: dabs it to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: short of length, dabs to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: fullish on leg stump, pushed back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: slashes at the sight of width and gets it away square of third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 2 runs

items.text: latches onto a pull against this short ball but finds deep square leg one-bounce
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: waits for this length ball and taps to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched to point who dives and half-stops it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: taps a length ball to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, no run

items.text: short of a length, sitting up nicely outside off, affording him the room to punch imperiously through the covers. Strong bottom hand
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: walks down a couple of steps and tucks to midwicket. Hello, hello.. the bowler has overstepped. One more shaved off the target, and a free-hit next-up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 1 no ball

items.text: that's imperious.. struck with brute force. Shortish, doesn't help that he's taken the pace off, because MSD has picked that up and gets more time to slap this straight past the umpire
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: short of good length, punched to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, no run

items.text: walks across towards off and deliberately slashes hard while reaching out to get an outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 2 runs

items.text: full on the pads, flicked out to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 2 runs

items.preText: Ramesh: "MSD sent in early pushing Karthik lower. Hasn't that been the case all along his career?"
items.text: short of a length on off, blocked to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: fullish on middle and leg, blocked
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.preText: Srinivasan: "Rohit's love affair with BD continues. Hope there is no controversy today to mask this brilliant knock like the WC one. Hoping to have Ind vs Afg finals. "
items.text: walks down the track loosely and swings, gets beaten and stays astray of the crease. Luckily, the keeper's throw doesn't find the stumps even as he's late in realising
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: short of good length, walks across, and tries to run it down, gets a mild edge as the back hand comes off, on the bounce to the keeper
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: short, wide, crunched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: waits and opens the face to deep backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: walks down the track and whips this to mid-on for a quick one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 1 run
